The 292 bus from Kidderminster offers a regular service.
Everywhere in this small town is accessible on foot. Unless you've been to too many of the pubs.
Beautiful old church with a crooked spire.

Large number of pubs per capita, including The Old Lion, The Talbot, The King's Arms, The Royal Fountain and The Bell.  All of which, depending on one's mood, can be highly entertaining venues for a pint or two
